title: Open Source Project Financial Models
description: Explore the diverse financial models for sustaining open source projects, including donations, crowdfunding, corporate sponsorships, service-based revenue, dual licensing, and grants. Learn how these models ensure long-term success while maintaining open source principles.
keywords: Open Source Financial Models, Donations, Crowdfunding, Corporate Sponsorships, Service-Based Revenue, Dual Licensing, Open Source Grants, Sustainable Open Source, Monetizing Open Source
